content.html: If a child is too young to know they are gay, they are too young to know they are straight. If a child is too young to know they are trans, they are too young to know they are cis. Stop treating being cishet as the default.
content.value:
If a child is too young to know they are gay, they are too young to know they are straight.

If a child is too young to know they are trans, they are too young to know they are cis.

Stop treating being cishet as the default.
